---
title: "Psychiatric imaging group"
---

Psychiatric imaging group is a collaboration between the researchers from the Institute of Psychiatry Psychology and Neuroscience at King's College London and MRC Laboratory of Medical Sciences. The research group is led by Professor Oliver Howes- Professor of Molecular Psychiatry at KCL and a consultant psychiatrist at South London and Maudlsley NHS trust. 

You can also find us on [King's College London](https://www.kcl.ac.uk/research/psychiatric-imaging-1) and [MRC Laboratory of Medical Sciences](https://lms.mrc.ac.uk/research-group/psychiatric-imaging/) websites.
